detailed_results.question: How does fixed income term compare to money market.

Main differences are fixed income term is suitable for companies with uncertain cash flows. Money market is suitable for companies with predictable cash flows.

• MMH has a slight edge over forward contract

• **Notification Method**: Original SROs are notified via government gazette to exempt tax for a person or class of persons (Section 76(1) of the Income Tax Act, 2023), while amendment SROs also follow this method but primarily aim to update existing rules.

detailed_results.question: How did Bangladeshs VAT system change after the 2012 VAT Act?
detailed_results.ground_truth: After the 2012 VAT Act, Bangladesh's VAT system sees significant changes. Like migration from 1991 VAT Act which is based account current to new system. The new system was designed to be more efficient and effective in managing account current balances. The VAT system now uses a prepaid vs postpaid system.
detailed_results.prediction:
The Bangladesh VAT system underwent changes after the 2012 VAT Act. Key changes include:

• The standard VAT rate was reduced to 15%.
• Certain items are exempt from VAT.
• A truncated rate (short value addition) is applicable for many services, with a full rate of 15% for companies providing services under certain conditions.

These changes aim to simplify the VAT system and make it more efficient.
